EmailTemplate.name: Surveys - LBW Issue Resolution
EmailTemplate.subject: Tell Us What You Think In 2 Minutes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Client_First_Name__c},
At Web.com, we are passionate about your success and are committed to continually improving the service we provide.
If you have a moment, weâ€™d be grateful if you could answer a few questions about your experience with our Lead Stream support team so we can continue to improve the Web.com experience for you and all the businesses we support.
Click the link below to take the survey about your recent request: http://survey.clicktools.com/app/survey/go.jsp?iv=d7kll8zvw464&q1={!Account.Id}&q2={!Case.Id}&q3={!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Thank you, Kevin Wells Vice President, Client Services
